text: Aur agar tum yateemon ke saath be-insafi karne se darte ho to jo auratein tumko pasand aayein unmein se do do, teen teen, char char se nikah karlo, lekin agar tumhein andesha ho ke unke saath adal na kar sakoge to phir ek hi biwi karo ya un auraton ko zaojiyat mein lao jo tumhare qabze mein aayi hain, be insafi se bachne ke liye yeh zyada qareen e sawab hai
